channel.title: Dijkstra on Li. Mingzhi

item.title: GA: 7. Dijkstra's algorithm
item.description: Statement This article is my study notes from the book: grokking algorithm: an illustrated guide for programmers and other curious people. Please refer to the original work for more details and indicate the source for reprinting. Weighted graphs: assigning weight to some edges. Dijkstra’s algorithm: What’s the shortest path to X? Cycles in graphs will make Dijkstra’s algorithm not work. Dijkstra’s algorithm Sometimes the shortest path is not the fastest path, since there are different weights with various edges.
